Class AbstractProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.rds749.common.AbstractProxy

  • public abstract class AbstractProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by jiaqi on 8/28/16. Calls ProxyMain to create connections to remote servers

      • start

        public final void start(Ice.Communicator ic)
                 throws java.lang.Exception

      • connectToServer

        protected BankAccountStub connectToServer(java.lang.String hostname,
                                          int port)
        Connect to the provided back-end server endpoint to send RPCs
        Parameters:
        hostname - Hostname of the server
        port - Port at which server is listening
        Returns:
        BankAccountStub, which is a stub for the RPCs implemented by the server

      • beginReadBalance

        protected abstract void beginReadBalance(int reqid)
        Responds to client requests for read balance. Remember to call remote server's readBalance()

      • beginChangeBalance

        protected abstract void beginChangeBalance(int reqid,
                                           int update)
        Responds to client requests to change balance. Remember to call remote server's changeBalance()

      • endReadBalance

        protected abstract void endReadBalance(long serverid,
                                       int reqid,
                                       int balance)
        Responds to server's replies to read balance. Remember to call AbstractProxy#clientProxy#endReadBalance(long, int, int)

      • endChangeBalance

        protected abstract void endChangeBalance(long serverid,
                                         int reqid,
                                         int balance)
        Responds to server's replies to change balance. Remember to call AbstractProxy#clientProxy#endChangeBalance(long, int, int)

      • serversFailed

        protected void serversFailed(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> failedServers)
        Called when server failures are detected. Call super.serversFailed if you override so that the heartbeat for failed server is not checked
        Parameters:
        failedServers - List of IDs of failed servers

      • serverRegistered

        protected abstract void serverRegistered(long id,
                                         BankAccountStub stub)
        Called when a server registers
        Parameters:
        id - The ID assigned to the server
        stub - The BankAccountStub that connects to the server
